headings: Prepare to fill an essential role in our healthcare system.
Admission Requirements, Degree Plan and Courses
What Can You Do With a Physical Therapy Degree?
Why Study Physical Therapy at Angelo State?
paragraphs: Our Doctor of Physical Therapy program will teach and train you to promote, restore and maintain optimal human function for people of all ages. You will develop the knowledge and skills you need to be a skilled physical therapist through our interactive program that focuses on the cardiopulmonary, integumentary, musculoskeletal and neurosensory systems of the human body.

You will also gain practical experience through various clinical rotations, conducting high-level research with your professors, and taking advantage of our state-of-the-art laboratory, fitness and therapy facilities in our new Health and Human Services Building and our Ben Kelly Center for Human Performance.

The Doctor of Physical Therapy at Angelo State University is accredited by the Commission on Accreditation in Physical Therapy Education (CAPTE), 3030 Potomac Ave., Suite 100, Alexandria, Virginia 22305-3085; telephone: 703-706-3245; email:accreditation@apta.org; website:http://www.capteonline.org. If needing to contact the program/institution directly, please call 325-942-2545 or emailptdept@angelo.edu.

Our experienced professional faculty provide an exceptional blend of educational, research and clinical expertise. Plus, with only 28 students admitted to our program each year, we have a 1:8 faculty-to-student ratio, so you get the individual attention you deserve. Our faculty interaction with students sets us apart from other D.P.T. programs in Texas.
Tuition & FeesWe don’t sacrifice quality for affordability. Angelo State is committed to helping you achieve your educational goals with as little debt as possible.

ASU Distinguished Graduate ScholarshipsEarn our premier graduate scholarship based on your highest degree GPA. Once you are admitted to an ASU graduate program, you will automatically be considered. No application is necessary.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.
We also have multiple scholarships dedicated specifically for PT students that can help lessen the already low cost of our program.

Start your career as soon as you graduate. The U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics reports that employment opportunities for licensed physical therapists are expected to increase by 17% through 2031, adding over 40,000 new jobs.

Our graduates have a 98% pass rate on their national licensure exams, including a 100% pass rate over the last four years. We also have a 100% employment rate for licensed graduates seeking employment. These rates are among the best at PT schools in Texas.

You will gain important practical experience in our six high-tech skills labs dedicated to orthopedic, cardiopulmonary and wound care instruction, as well as manual therapy, electrotherapy, gait analysis and neuroscience. We also offer an elective course that can lead to certification as a Strength and Conditioning Specialist.

You can present the results of your research to the campus and the community at our annual Graduate Research Showcase, network and gain new insights in our PT Lunch and Learn Series, and join our active Angelo Student Physical Therapy Association student group for social and community activities, networking and professional development.

Take advantage of a unique opportunity to gain real-world experience on our winter study abroad trip to Oaxaca, Mexico. You will provide physical therapy examination and treatment in an underserved, non-traditional healthcare setting under the guidance of ASU faculty. You will also interact with local PT students and go on various cultural excursions. Completing this program will broaden your horizons and improve your professional employment prospects when you graduate.

Whether you’re pursuing a master’s degree, doctoral degree or certificate/certification, you have access to all the services in ourCollege of Graduate Studies and Research. You’ll find information and resources for everything from registering for classes and writing a thesis – to available graduate/teaching assistantships and graduate research opportunities.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
